init

public void init(GL2 gl,
                 GLU glu)
Initialize the tessellation process by registering the required tessellation callbacks to the tessellation object.

Parameters:
gl - the GL pipeline object
glu - the GL utility library object

setWindingRule

public void setWindingRule(double windingRule)
Sets the winding rule used for the tessellation process. By using this method it is possible to draw polygons with holes inside.

Parameters:
windingRule - the winding rule that should be used
